Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 11th overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1986...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 7/14/1989, off Andy McGaffigan (SF)...
Drove in 6 runs against Atlanta on 8/12/1989...
Injured on 5/14/1990 with a Torn Abdominal Muscle, out for 2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1991, hitting .400 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Cincinnati on 5/26/1991...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/6/1991, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 4 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1992, hitting .500 with 5 HR, 10 RBI...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Drove in 7 runs against Atlanta on 5/2/1993...
Injured on 6/22/1993 with a Jammed Finger, out for one week...
Was selected to the 1993 Allstar game...
Hit for the cycle against Los Angeles on 7/8/1993...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Los Angeles on 7/8/1993...
Hit for the cycle against Pittsburgh on 9/20/1993...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1993, hitting .583 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Houston on 1/31/1994 (Going to HOU: P R. Clemens, LF G. Vaughn, 2B M. McGwire. Going to CHC: 1B J. Thome, RF J. Gonzalez, RF R. Greer, P D. Wells, C E. Wedge)...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1994, hitting .360 with 8 HR, 17 RBI...
Won World Series with Houston in 1994...
Drove in 6 runs against Pittsburgh on 4/14/1995...
Was selected to the 1995 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/19/1995 with a Strained Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 2 weeks...
Won World Series with Houston in 1995...
